$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Don't hesitate to call for me should
you need my assistance, Eirika. I'll
come to your aid in a heartbeat.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Thank you, Ephraim. But no matter
what happens, I'll continue to fight. I
am your sister, after all!$k$p$Sbs1000|
